Title: Relates to the application of special rebates and discounts to certain eligible energy users
Summary: Relates to the application of special rebates and discounts to certain eligible energy users that conduct a manufacturing activity within the city which produces new goods primarily from waste paper or other recyclables collected from residential sources in the city.
LawCode: Amd ยง22-602, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the application of special rebates and discounts to certain eligible energy users
